thread.title: Phil Parker

author: Phil Parker
title: Phil Parker
text: What a great service first class updates via email and the fitter phoned to let us know when he would arive and then just got on with the job he was polite and let us know what he found and what he would do. I will definatly be telling our frends and family to use your services and we definatly will be calling on you in the future we have 3 cars on the drive
